name: Girls' Deadly School
description:
Girls’ Deadly School is a 3D anime-style rogue-lite shooter.

Something happened in the female school and it was cut off from the rest of the world, and most of the students went crazy. Will the main character Sasha get out alive?

The goal, as in most rogue-lite, is to pass randomly generated floors and defeat the final boss.

FEATURES

  • Anime-style cel-shading 3D graphic
  • Anime school girls as protagonist
  • Anime school girls as enemies
  • Anime school girls as bosses
  • ANIME IS EVERYTHING!!!
  • 5 procedurally generated floors 
  • 5 unique bosses
  • 2 playable character
  • Permanent death
  • Banned in Steam
